text: Gianni Dean Lombard (born ) is a South African rugby union player for the in the Currie Cup and the in the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is wing or fullback. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:People from Worcester, Western Cape Category:Rugby union fly-halves Category:Rugby union wings Category:Rugby union fullbacks Category:Golden Lions players Category:South Africa Under-20 international rugby union players
title: Gianni Lombard
